Fastblues

I use this in "Mad About Him...Blues".

  • FastBluesSus

FastBlues

Fast blues with a bit of R&B. (4)
Bass FingeredBass
Chord-Guitar CleanGuitar
Chord-Piano Piano2
Chord-Sax TenorSax
Drum-Hh OpenHiHat
Drum-Kick KickDrum1
Drum-Snare SnareDrum1
Drum-Snare2 SnareDrum2
